ctas.name: Centered Simple CTA
ctas.description: Clean, centered call-to-action with headline and primary button

ctas.name: Emergency Contact CTA
ctas.description: Urgent call-to-action for emergency services with phone emphasis
ctas.template:
import Link from 'next/link' import { Phone, Clock, Shield, AlertTriangle } from 'lucide-react' export default function CTA() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "Emergency Service Available 24/7", description: "Don't let plumbing emergencies turn into disasters. Our licensed professionals are standing by to help.", emergencyPhone: "(555) 911-HELP", phoneNumber: "5559114357", responseTime: "30 Minutes or Less", primaryCta: { text: "Call Emergency Line", href: "tel:5559114357" }, secondaryCta: { text: "Request Service", href: "/contact" }, trustIndicators: [ "Licensed & Insured", "Local Professionals", "Upfront Pricing", "No Hidden Fees" ] } return (
{/* Emergency Alert */}
EMERGENCY SERVICES AVAILABLE

{data.headline}

{data.description}

{/* Emergency Phone Prominent Display */}
Emergency Hotline
{data.emergencyPhone}
{data.responseTime}
{data.primaryCta.text} {data.secondaryCta.text}
{/* Trust Indicators */}
{data.trustIndicators.map((indicator, index) => (
{indicator}
))}
) }

ctas.name: Two Column Contact CTA
ctas.description: Split layout with contact form and phone/info on sides
ctas.template:
import Link from 'next/link' import { Phone, Mail, MapPin, Calendar, Clock, Award } from 'lucide-react' export default function CTA() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "Get Your Free Consultation", description: "Ready to start your project? Contact our licensed professionals for a free, no-obligation consultation and detailed estimate.", contactInfo: { phone: "(555) 123-4567", email: "info@company.com", address: "123 Main Street, City, ST 12345", hours: "Mon-Fri 7AM-6PM, Sat 8AM-4PM" }, benefits: [ "Free consultation", "Written estimates", "Licensed & insured", "Same-day service available" ], primaryCta: { text: "Call Now", href: "tel:5551234567" }, secondaryCta: { text: "Schedule Online", href: "/contact" } } return (
{/* Left Column - Call to Action */}

{data.headline}

{data.description}

{/* Benefits List */}
{data.benefits.map((benefit, index) => (
{benefit}
))}
{data.primaryCta.text} {data.secondaryCta.text}
{/* Right Column - Contact Information */}

Contact Information

{data.contactInfo.phone}
Call or text anytime
{data.contactInfo.email}
Email for non-urgent inquiries
{data.contactInfo.address}
Our office location
{data.contactInfo.hours}
Business hours
Licensed & Insured Professionals

Fully licensed contractor with comprehensive insurance coverage

) }

ctas.name: Service Quote CTA
ctas.description: Service-focused CTA emphasizing free estimates and guarantees
ctas.template:
import Link from 'next/link' import { Phone, Calendar, Shield, Award, CheckCircle, FileText } from 'lucide-react' export default function CTA() { // Component data - will be populated by AI const data = { headline: "Ready for Professional Service?", description: "Get a free, detailed estimate from licensed professionals. No obligations, no pressure - just honest advice and competitive pricing.", guarantees: [ "100% Satisfaction Guarantee", "Licensed & Insured", "Free Written Estimates", "Upfront Pricing", "5-Year Warranty", "Emergency Service Available" ], primaryCta: { text: "Get Free Estimate", href: "/contact" }, emergencyCta: { text: "Emergency Service", href: "tel:5559114357", phone: "(555) 911-HELP" }, processSteps: [ "Call or schedule online", "Free on-site assessment", "Written estimate provided", "Professional work completed" ] } return (
{/* Left Side - Main CTA */}

{data.headline}

{data.description}

{/* Process Steps */}

Our Simple Process:

{data.processSteps.map((step, index) => (
{index + 1}
{step}
))}
{data.primaryCta.text} {data.emergencyCta.text}
{/* Right Side - Guarantees */}

Our Guarantees

{data.guarantees.map((guarantee, index) => (
{guarantee}
))}
A+ BBB Rating
Trusted by hundreds of satisfied customers
Licensed Contractor #123456
) }

ctas.name: Gradient Modern CTA
ctas.description: Modern gradient CTA with statistics and social proof
